T.query: select i.instance_id,db.database_id,tbl.table_id,ix.stat_id from instances i join databases db on i.instance_id = db.instance_id join pg_table_stats tbl on tbl.database_id = db.database_id join index_stats ix on ix.database_id = tbl.database_id and tbl.table_id = ix.table_id

F.query: select i.instance_id,db.database_id,tbl.table_id,ix.stat_id from instances i join databases db on i.instance_id = db.instance_id join pg_table_stats tbl on tbl.database_id = db.database_id right join index_stats ix on ix.database_id = tbl.database_id and tbl.table_id = ix.table_id

select i.instance_id,db.database_id,tbl.table_id,ix.stat_id from instances i join databases db on i.instance_id = db.instance_id join pg_table_stats tbl on tbl.table_id = db.database_id join index_stats ix on ix.database_id = tbl.database_id and tbl.table_id = ix.table_id

select i.instance_id,db.database_id,tbl.table_id,ix.stat_id from instances i join databases db on i.instance_id = db.instance_id join pg_table_stats tbl on tbl.database_id = db.database_id and tbl.table_id = db.database_id join index_stats ix on ix.database_id = tbl.database_id and tbl.table_id = ix.table_id

select i.instance_id,db.database_id,tbl.table_id,ix.stat_id from instances i join databases db on i.instance_id = db.instance_id join pg_table_stats tbl on tbl.database_id = db.database_id and tbl.table_id = db.database_id right join index_stats ix on ix.database_id = tbl.database_id
